titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on certain chemicals.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S16455)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 11/19/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1996, the duty on: (1) 3,5-dimethyl-2-hydroxymethyl-4-methoxy-pyridine (pyrmethyl alcohol); and (2) 2-mercapto 5-methoxy benzimidazole (metmercazole).
